item.title: [Flash] Basic movement (UPDATE)
item.dc:creator: @Winter_Ice Winter Ice
item.description:
@Winter_Ice wrote:

Basic Movment tut
In this tut you will hopefully learn the basics of space invaider movement (warning this is bad actionscript movment)

Step 1:open up a new Flash Document and Make a Circle in the middle of it.
Step 2:right click the circle and select “Convert to symbol” then select button and call it ummm well anything you want.
Step 3:click the circle and at the bottom click the arrrow that is facing up and in the actionscript bit add this.

[code]
on(keyPress “”){

this._x -= 5

}
on(keyPress “”){

this._x += 5

}
on(keyPress “”){

this._y-= 5

}
on(KeyPress “”){

this._Y+= 5

}[/code]
Step 4:now press CTRL + ALT + ENTER and well press the right and left arrow keys.

Outcomes:Just search Space Invaders in google lol

Credits:Ice

Read full topic
